TextEng: Is there something you need help with, sir?
I'm more trouble than you can handle!
Text: 난 네가 감당할 수 있는 것보다 더 위험한 존재야!

TextEng: I could not care less what you think of me, fool.
Text: 네가 날 어떻게 생각하든 관심 없어, 멍청아.

TextEng: I'm on important business.
And why would I be any trouble?
Who cares? I have other things to worry about.
Text: 누가 신경 써? 걱정할 일이 많아서.

TextEng: I've got to go.
I need to find the herbalist.
I need some equipment. Can you help me out?
There are still some kobolds in Hilltop. Will you help with them?
Text: 힐탑에 아직 코볼트가 남아 있어. 도와줄래?

TextEng: Reinforcements from Silverymoon?
Do you know where the surviving kobolds went?
I wanted to report that I found Mara... dead. Just outside Hilltop.
Text: 마라를 찾았다는 걸 보고하려고... 죽은 채로. 힐탑 바로 밖에서.

TextEng: I thought you should know... the kobolds killed everyone in the tavern.
Text: 알아야 할 것 같아서... 코볼트들이 주점에 있던 모두를 죽였어.

TextEng: Is there anything in Hilltop I can do to help out?
He was alive, last time I saw him.
He's not good. He was poisoned by kobolds.
He was poisoned by kobolds, actually. I need to get some herbs for him.
Text: 사실 코볼트의 독에 당했어. 약초를 구해야 해.

TextEng: He was poisoned, but he's recovering now at the school.
Text: 코볼트의 독에 당했지만 지금은 학교에서 회복 중이야.

TextEng: We could have used your help when the kobolds attacked, you know.
Text: 코볼트가 공격했을 때 네 도움이 있었으면 좋았을 텐데.
